metadata.title: CVE-2016-1585 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In all versions of AppArmor mount rules are accidentally widened whencompiled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1585` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apparmor - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
apparmor-notify - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
apparmor-profiles - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
apparmor-utils - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
dh-apparmor - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
libapache2-mod-apparmor - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
libapparmor1 - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
libpam-apparmor - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
python3-apparmor - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
python3-libapparmor - 3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apparmor package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-2ubuntu2.4').
